title: Carlos Oyarzun
text:
Carlos Iván Oyarzun Guíñez (born 26 October 1981) is a <a href="Chile">Chile</a>an professional <a href="road%20bicycle%20racing">road cyclist</a>, who currently rides for <a href="UCI%20Continental%20team">UCI Continental team</a> . Oyarzun has also rode for <a href="UCI%20ProTour%23List%20of%20current%20UCI%20ProTeams">UCI ProTeam</a> .
Doping.
On 20 July 2015 the Chilean Olympic Committee announced that Oyarzun had been sent home from the <a href="2015%20Pan%20American%20Games">2015 Pan American Games</a> in Toronto after he had tested positive for the <a href="HIF%20prolyl-hydroxylase%20inhibitor">HIF prolyl-hydroxylase inhibitor</a> <a href="FG-4592">FG-4592</a> in a pre-competition test. Oyarzun was at the Games to ride the time trial, but was sent home prior to the event.
